00090 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL SRF_PolarStereographic: public BaseSRF_MapProjection
00091 {
00092 public:
00096     static SRF_PolarStereographic* create(      SRM_ORM_Code orm,
00097                                                 SRM_RT_Code  rt,
00098                                           const SRM_PS_Parameters &params);
00099 
00103     static SRF_PolarStereographic* create(
00104                                           SRM_ORM_Code     orm,
00105                                           SRM_RT_Code      rt,
00106                                           SRM_Polar_Aspect polar_aspect,
00107                                           SRM_Long_Float   origin_longitude,
00108                                           SRM_Long_Float   central_scale,
00109                                           SRM_Long_Float   false_easting,
00110                                           SRM_Long_Float   false_northing
00111                                           );
00112 
00116     static SRF_PolarStereographic* create( SRM_SRF_Parameters_Info srf_params )
00117     {
00118         return create(srf_params.value.srf_template.orm_code,
00119                       srf_params.rt_code,
00120                       srf_params.value.srf_template.parameters.ps_srf_parameters);
00121     }
00122 
00125     Coord3D* createCoordinate3D(SRM_Long_Float coord_comp1,
00126                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp2,
00127                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp3 );
00128 
00131     CoordSurf* createSurfaceCoordinate(SRM_Long_Float coord_surf_comp1,
00132                                        SRM_Long_Float coord_surf_comp2 );
00133 
00137     const SRM_PS_Parameters &getSRFParameters() const;
00138 
00142     SRM_Polar_Aspect get_polar_aspect() const;
00143 
00147     SRM_Long_Float get_origin_longitude() const;
00148 
00152     SRM_Long_Float get_central_scale() const;
00153 
00157     SRM_Long_Float get_false_easting() const;
00158 
00162     SRM_Long_Float get_false_northing() const;
00163 
00166     virtual bool isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const;
00167 
00170     virtual SRF_ClassType getClassType() const
00171     {
00172         return BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_PS;
00173     }
00174 
00178     bool isEqual( const SRF_PolarStereographic &srf ) const;
00179 
00183     bool operator==( const SRF_PolarStereographic &rhs ) const;
00184 
00188     SRF_PolarStereographic* makeCopy() const;
00189 
00197     virtual SRM_Coordinate_Valid_Region changeCoordinate3DSRF(const Coord3D &src_coord,
00198                                                                     Coord3D &des_coord);
00199 
00203     const char* toString();
00204 
00205 protected:
00206     friend class BaseSRF;
00207     friend class BaseSRF_3D;
00208     friend class BaseSRF_WithEllipsoidalHeight;
00209     SRF_PolarStereographic( void *impl ); 
00210     SRF_PolarStereographic &operator =( const SRF_PolarStereographic & ) { return *this; } 
00211     virtual ~SRF_PolarStereographic(); 
00212 };

00215 inline bool SRF_PolarStereographic::isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const
00216 {
00217     if (type == BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_PS)
00218         return true;
00219     else
00220         return BaseSRF_MapProjection::isA(type);
00221 };

00225 typedef SRF_PolarStereographic SRF_PS;
00226 
00227 
00232 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Coord3D_PolarStereographic: public Coord3D
00233 {
00234 public:
00237     Coord3D_PolarStereographic(SRF_PolarStereographic *srf,
00238                                SRM_Long_Float easting = 0.0,
00239                                SRM_Long_Float northing = 0.0,
00240                                SRM_Long_Float ellipsoidal_height = 0.0)
00241     : Coord3D(srf)
00242     {
00243         setComponentValues(easting, northing, ellipsoidal_height);
00244     }
00245 
00248     Coord3D_PolarStereographic( const Coord3D_PolarStereographic &coord )
00249     : Coord3D(coord._srf)
00250     {
00251         setComponentValues(coord._values[0], coord._values[1], coord._values[2]);
00252     }
00253 
00259     void copyTo( Coord3D_PolarStereographic &coord ) const
00260     {
00261         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00262             throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00263 
00264         coord._values[0] = _values[0];
00265         coord._values[1] = _values[1];
00266         coord._values[2] = _values[2];
00267     }
00268 
00272     bool isEqual( const Coord3D_PolarStereographic &coord ) const
00273     {
00274         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00275                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00276                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] &&
00277                 _values[2] == coord._values[2]);
00278     }
00279 
00282     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float easting, SRM_Long_Float northing, SRM_Long_Float ellipsoidal_height )
00283     {
00284         _values[0] = easting;
00285         _values[1] = northing;
00286         _values[2] = ellipsoidal_height;
00287     }
00288 
00291     SRM_Long_Float get_easting() const
00292     {
00293         return _values[0];
00294     }
00295 
00298     SRM_Long_Float get_northing() const
00299     {
00300         return _values[1];
00301     }
00302 
00305     SRM_Long_Float get_ellipsoidal_height() const
00306     {
00307         return _values[2];
00308     }
00309 
00312     void set_easting( SRM_Long_Float value )
00313     {
00314         _values[0] = value;
00315     }
00316 
00319     void set_northing( SRM_Long_Float value )
00320     {
00321         _values[1] = value;
00322     }
00323 
00326     void set_ellipsoidal_height( SRM_Long_Float value )
00327     {
00328         _values[2] = value;
00329     }
00330 
00333     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00334 
00337     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00338     {
00339         return Coord::COORD_TYP_PS;
00340     }
00341 
00344     bool operator==( const Coord3D_PolarStereographic &rhs ) const;
00345 
00351     bool isCompatibleWith( const Coord3D_PolarStereographic &rhs ) const
00352     {
00353         return ((*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(rhs._srf)));
00354     }
00355 
00360     Coord3D_PolarStereographic &operator= ( const Coord3D_PolarStereographic &rhs )
00361     {
00362         if((*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(rhs._srf)))
00363         {
00364             _values[0] = rhs._values[0];
00365             _values[1] = rhs._values[1];
00366             _values[2] = rhs._values[2];
00367         }
00368         else
00369             throw Exception(SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_TARGET_COORDINATE,
00370                             "Coord3D_PolarStereographic op=: incompatible rhs coordinate");
00371 
00372         return *this;
00373     }
00374 };
00375 
00376 
00377 inline bool Coord3D_PolarStereographic::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00378 {
00379     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_PS)
00380         return true;
00381     else
00382         return Coord3D::isA(type);
00383 };
00384 
00385 
00387 typedef Coord3D_PolarStereographic Coord3D_PS;
00388

00394 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL CoordSurf_PolarStereographic: public CoordSurf
00395 {
00396 public:
00399     CoordSurf_PolarStereographic(SRF_PolarStereographic *srf,
00400                                  SRM_Long_Float easting = 0.0,
00401                                  SRM_Long_Float northing = 0.0 )
00402     : CoordSurf(srf)
00403     {
00404         setComponentValues(easting, northing);
00405     }
00406 
00409     CoordSurf_PolarStereographic( const CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &coord )
00410     : CoordSurf(coord._srf)
00411     {
00412         setComponentValues( coord._values[0], coord._values[1] );
00413     }
00414 
00420     void copyTo( CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &coord ) const
00421     {
00422         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00423             throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00424 
00425         coord._values[0] = _values[0];
00426         coord._values[1] = _values[1];
00427     }
00428 
00432     bool isEqual( const CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &coord ) const
00433     {
00434         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00435                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00436                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] );
00437     }
00438 
00441     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float easting, SRM_Long_Float northing )
00442     {
00443         _values[0] = easting;
00444         _values[1] = northing;
00445     }
00446 
00449     SRM_Long_Float get_easting() const
00450     {
00451         return _values[0];
00452     }
00453 
00456     SRM_Long_Float get_northing() const
00457     {
00458         return _values[1];
00459     }
00460 
00463     void set_easting( SRM_Long_Float value )
00464     {
00465         _values[0] = value;
00466     }
00467 
00470     void set_northing( SRM_Long_Float value )
00471     {
00472         _values[1] = value;
00473     }
00474 
00477     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00478 
00481     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00482     {
00483         return Coord::COORD_TYP_SURF_PS;
00484     }
00485 
00488     bool operator==( const CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &rhs ) const;
00489 
00495     bool isCompatibleWith( const CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &rhs ) const
00496     {
00497         return ((*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(rhs._srf)));
00498     }
00499 
00504     CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &operator= ( const CoordSurf_PolarStereographic &rhs )
00505     {
00506         if((*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_PolarStereographic*)(rhs._srf)))
00507         {
00508             _values[0] = rhs._values[0];
00509             _values[1] = rhs._values[1];
00510         }
00511         else
00512             throw Exception(SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_TARGET_COORDINATE,
00513                             "CoordSurf_PolarStereographic op=: incompatible rhs coordinate");
00514 
00515         return *this;
00516     }
00517 };
00518 
00519 
00520 inline bool CoordSurf_PolarStereographic::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00521 {
00522     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_SURF_PS)
00523         return true;
00524     else
00525         return CoordSurf::isA(type);
00526 };
